entry.title: Vite report on Fri, 13 Oct 2023 20:02:13
entry.summary:
Tech:
- The MCRA platform for EU regulatory actions: governance, user ... - EFSA news
- Wiley in India Introduces Online Mock Tests in Hindi for UPSC's ... - Press Trust of India
- Hackers infiltrated Israeli smart billboards to post pro-Hamas messages, reports say
- Retailers are using a simple mind trick on you to make their discounts seem bigger than they are
- Presentation: The Commoditization of the Software Stack: How Application-first Cloud Services are Changing the Game
- Durable Execution for Control Planes: Sergey Bykov at QCon San Francisco
- The cult of Obsidian: Why people are obsessed with the note-taking app
- While Amazon is under fire, its doorbell brand is offering $1 million for proof of aliens
- Meta made its Llama 2 AI model open-source because 'Zuck has balls,' a former top Facebook engineer says
- Google tests adding a Discover Feed to its valuable desktop homepage
- Tradeshift co-founder accused of sexual assault by company, allegations he denies

Business:
- I did 4 things to pay for college as a first-generation, low-income student
- McDonald's is donating thousands of free meals to the Israel Defence Forces and citizens after Hamas attacks
- CEOs condemn Hamas attacks and express support for Israel in messages to employees
- How US tax dollars have supported Israel and its military for 75 years — and what's next for American aid
- Mortgage Interest Rates Today, October 13, 2023 | Rates Are Cooling, but Will it Last?
- There's now a 50% chance of world war as the Israel-Hamas conflict threatens to spread, hedge fund legend Ray Dalio says
- Israeli startup founders go to war: 'We're fighting for our home.'
- China still can't beat deflation as its economy continues to flounder
- Some Walmart employees say customers are getting hostile at self-checkout — and they blame anti-theft tech
- Legislation to Support Stillbirth Prevention Heads to House After Unanimous Senate Approval

AI:
- Jeremy Grantham and Bill Gross have warned stocks are overvalued. Wharton professor Jeremy Siegel disagrees: "They are underpriced"

Other:
- Over half of pet owners don’t want vaccines for their dogs
- Who is Sam Wrench, director of Taylor Swift’s Eras tour movie?
- How Local Projects translated the horrors of the Holocaust into a kid-friendly museum experience
- Go in the Devil's Name: When Isobel Gowdie Confessed to Being a Witch
- Cricket-mad India is hosting the World Cup – and tickets are reselling at astronomical prices
- I'll never regret living in Europe after giving birth. I got way better maternity leave and my American friends envied me.
- Vomit fees are being added to some restaurant brunch bills. Be careful with those bottomless mimosas!

Insights:
- The tech section covers a range of topics including cybersecurity, software development, and AI. It highlights the advancements and challenges in these areas.
- The business section focuses on financial matters, international conflicts, and the impact of policies on various industries.
- The AI section presents contrasting opinions on the stock market, showcasing the diversity of perspectives in the field.
- The other section includes diverse topics such as pet care, entertainment, historical events, and cultural experiences.
- Overall, the report provides a snapshot of current news and trends across different sectors, highlighting the interconnectedness of technology, business, and society.
